title: If service features exist, recommend geo-gating in RED

then.recommendation: Implement/verify jurisdiction gating for service features (swaps/on-ramps) in all RED jurisdictions; document fallback behavior.

title: If team members work from RED, recommend restricted mode controls

then.recommendation: Enable restricted mode for the affected teammate(s): revoke release keys, block privacy-module access, pause local-facing demos/support.

title: If next review is due soon, recommend running policy review

then.recommendation: Run the quarterly policy monitoring review; confirm tiers and update sources/notes.

title: If a partner delists/refuses privacy assets, recommend partner strategy update

then.recommendation: Update the partner strategy reality-check; mark impacted jurisdictions/features and prioritize fallbacks.

title: If a jurisdiction tier changes, recommend updating the launch matrix and comms

then.recommendation: Update the launch matrix and guardrails; communicate change to engineering/product/marketing; record decision log entry.

title: If primary sources are missing, recommend adding citations/links

then.recommendation: Add primary-source links (rulebooks, regulations, regulator pages) for jurisdictions that are missing them, and record verification dates.
